answers.answer: How old is your grandfather? Age does play a factor on what the normal range is for senior citizens. The older one gets, the higher the level. My Aunt, who is 83, has Parkinson's, has a range of 160-190. But this is her range and not your grandfather's so don't go by this. Call his doctor to see what he/she has set for him.

question: my grandfather has diabetes II and he has a self monitor test for home... what should be considered normal and what is considered high?
title: normal ranges
